src:
James Maddison Cemerlang, Fans Manchester United Makin Ngidam
04 Nov 2019, 11:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pendukung Manchester United tampaknya dibuat semakin kesengsem dan ngidam memiliki talenta James Maddison dalam tim. Hal itu semakin terlihat setelah bintang Leicester City tersebut tampil gemilang ketika mengalahkan Crystal Palace dua gol tanpa balas.
Dua gol yang dicetak Jamie Vardy dan Caglar Soyuncumen jadi pembeda di pertandingan yang digelar di Selhurst Park, Minggu (4/11/2019) kemarin malam WIB. Kemenangan ini membuat The Foxes kini menempati posisi ketiga klasemen Premier League.
Kemenangan ini juga melanjutkan performa apik The Foxes di awal musim ini. Dan salah satu yang paling utama dalam perjalanan mereka adalah kemampuan mereka menciptakan gol dan membuat peluang demi peluang.
Para pemain seperti Vardy, Tielemans, Barnes dan Perez telah menjadi elemen kunci sejauh ini. Namun tak ada yang banyak menyita perhatian daripada James Maddison.
Gelandang Inggris tersebut kembali tampil gemilang ketika melawan Crystal Palace. Pada laga itu, ia menciptakan delapan peluang. Jumlah itu adalah terbanyak yang dilakukan seorang pemain di laga tandang Premier League musim ini.
Menyusul kemenangan dan penampilan gemilang ini, fans Manchester United pun kembali menggaungkan pembajakan James Maddison ke Old Trafford. Tak percaya? Berikut beberapa cuitan suporter MU setelah melihat penampilan gelandang berusia 22 tahun tersebut.
text:
James Maddison Shining, Manchester United Fans More Cravings
Nov 04 2019, 11:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United supporters seem made even more miserable and cravings have the talent of James Maddison in the team. This was increasingly seen after the Leicester City star performed brilliantly when he defeated Crystal Palace two goals without reply.
Two goals scored by Jamie Vardy and Caglar Soyuncumen were the differentiators in the match that was held at Selhurst Park on Sunday (11/04/2019). This victory makes The Foxes now occupies third place in the Premier League standings.
This victory also continues the slick performance of The Foxes at the beginning of this season. And one of the most important in their journey is their ability to create goals and make opportunities for opportunities.
Players like Vardy, Tielemans, Barnes and Perez have been key elements so far. But there is not much attention from James Maddison.
The England midfielder again performed brilliantly against Crystal Palace. In that fight, he created eight chances. That number is the most done by a player in an away match this season's Premier League.
Following this glorious victory and performance, Manchester United fans again echoed James Maddison's hijacking to Old Trafford. Do not believe? Here are some of the MU fans' chant after seeing the appearance of the 22-year-old midfielder.
